mapper.select: select * from wk_cus_chat_member where user_id = #{userId} limit 1
mapper.update: update wk_cus_chat_member set status = #{status} ,is_busy = #{isBusy} where user_id = #{id} and `type` = 1
mapper.select: select a.* from wk_cus_chat_member a inner join wk_cus_info b on a.user_id = b.uu_id where a.status = 1 and a.type = 1 and a.is_busy = 0 and b.status = 1
mapper.update: update wk_cus_chat_member set is_busy = #{busy} where user_id = #{userId} and is_busy != #{busy};
